forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun begins its ascent on this fine morning in Downtown San Francisco, the air is cool, yet a gentle warmth looms on the horizon. Today promises a generous measure of sunshine, inviting you to step outside and savor the day. The high temperature will linger around 65, dipping slightly in the afternoon, as a lively west-southwest breeze whispers through the city, carrying with it the essence of summer afternoons. 

Amidst the clear blue above, expect a few clouds to grace the sky, suggesting a soft, velvety backdrop rather than a complete shroud. The morning may still be tinged with hints of the marine layer, a gentle fog rolling gently along the Bay, but it has largely receded, yielding a bright day with low humidity, perfect for strolls along the waterfront or exploring the charming sidewalks of the Mission. So, don a light sweater or a casual jacket, attire that accommodates both the whimsical coolness of morning and the warm embrace of midday. Consider indulging in a mid-morning coffee at one of the local cafés, perhaps finding a sunny perch to watch the city awaken, or embracing the spirit of exploration—take a leisurely walk over the Golden Gate or wander through the vibrant streets of the Castro. Today beckons with allure, promising simplicity and pleasure in the moments spent outdoors.
